title: [Health] Babies are two-thirds less likely to get the flu in their first six months of life if their mother had a flu vaccine while they were pregnant, a large Australian study shows

[Health] Oral stimuli during the chewing of food can help increase energy expenditure of body and prevent obesity, according to a new study. Backed by robust science, slow eating and thorough chewing could be the latest recommendations for integration into our weight management efforts.
